Welcome back to the The National Departm: Re ya o amohela hape Lefapheng la Naha la Bophelo bo Botle ba TB HealthCheck
Unfortunately, you cannot participate in: Ka bomalimabe, u ke ke ua nka karolo phuputsong ho feta hang. O ntse o ka tswela pele ka TB CHECK empa o ke ke wa kenyelletswa diphuputsong.
This service works best when you choose: Tshebeletso ena e sebetsa hantle ha o kgetha dikgetho tsa dinomoro lenaneng.
The National Department of Health thanks: Lefapha la Naha la Bophelo le leboha ka ho thusa ho sireletsa bophelo ba baahi bohle ba SA. Emisa ho ata ha TB.
This NDoH service only provides health i: Tshebeletso ena ya NDoH e fana ka lesedi la bophelo feela. Ka kopo dumela ho nka boikarabello ba tlhokomelo le kalafo ya hao.
Kgutlela tshebeletsong ena neng kapa neng. Hopola, ha o nahana hore o na le TB, qoba ho kopana le batho ba bang mme o etse tlhahlobo tleliniking e haufi.
TB HealthCheck does not replace medical: TB HealthCheck ha e nke sebaka sa dikeletso tsa bongaka, diteko kapa kalafo. Fumana keletso ya bongaka ka boemo ba hao ba bongaka le tlhokomelo.
You use this info at your own risk. This: O sebedisa lesedi lena kotsing ya hao. Dumela ho se natse kapa ho dieha ho fumana dikeletso tsa bongaka ka kalafo kapa tlhokomelo
Your personal information is protected u: Dintlha tsa hao tsa botho di sireleditswe ka molao wa POPI le ka dipehelo tsa Tsebiso ya Lekunutu la TBHealthCheck e romeletsweng wena ka SMS.
Please reply with numbers. Choose your p: Araba ka nomoro. Kgetha puo eo o ikgethela

Check if those you live with are on TB t: Bona haeba bao o phelang le bona ba kalafong ya TB. Ha o sa tsebe boemo ba hao ba HIV, etela tleliniki ho hlahlobela HIV. Ebe o etsa tlhahlobo ya TB hape.

What information will you ask me for?: Ke tlhahisoleseding e feng eo o tla nkopa yona?
What to do if I am unhappy?: Ke reng he ke sa thaba?
Many people don't realise that TB is cur: Ba bangata ha ba elellwe hore TB ya phekoleha mme ba etsa diteko morao haholo. Dikarabo tsa hao di tla re thusa ho utlwisisa hore na ehlile TB HealthCheck e thusa batho.
Did TB HealthCheck encourage you to get: Na TB HealthCheck e o kgothalelitse ho hlahloba?
Would you have tested without TB HealthC: Na o ka be u hlahlobile ntle le TB HealthCheck?
Would you have further delayed testing w: Na o ka bo diehile ho hlahloba ntle le TB HealthCheck?

Dinako tsa ho ema tleliniking di ne di le telele haholo.

Was it difficult to get access to a TB t: Na ho ne ho le thata ho fumana tlhahlobo ya LEFUBA? Ka kopo araba ka dintlha tsa mathata afe kapa afe ao o bileng le ona.
Why did you go to the clinic for a TB te: Hobaneng o ile tleliniking bakeng sa tlhahlobo ya LEFUBA?
Can we phone you to get more information: Na re ka o letsetsa ho fumana dintlha tse ding?
